dialogue.text: Oh, the boy wanted you to bring him a #t4031554#? No problem, I was on his debt anyway. Now, tell him I am repaying the debt, OK?
Oh, the boy wanted you to bring him a #t4031554#? Make room at your ETC inventory first.

listSelection.title: I am a man of many talents. Let me know what you'd like to do. #b

dialogue.text: Oh, talk to me when you have decided what you want from me. I am very busy right now.
If you want to make a medicine, you must study the Book on Herbal Medicine first. Nothing is more dangerous than practicing a medicine without proper knowledge.
